aliases.name: push
aliases.command: gittey check && gittey commit && git push

aliases.name: check
aliases.command: cls && dotnet test WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests --collect:"XPlat Code Coverage" && reportgenerator -reports:"WorkMood.MauiApp.Tests\TestResults\**\coverage.cobertura.xml" -targetdir:"CoverageReport" -reporttypes:"TextSummary" -verbosity:Off && powershell -Command "Get-Content 'CoverageReport\Summary.txt'"
